Title: ngramMinHashArgCaseInsensitive
Description: Splits a ASCII string into n-grams of ngramsize symbols and returns the n-grams with minimum and maximum hashes, calculated by the ngramMinHashCaseInsensitive function with the same input. Is case insensitive.

string — String. String.ngramsize — The size of an n-gram. Optional. Possible values: any number from 1 to 25. Default value: 3. UInt8.hashnum — The number of minimum and maximum hashes used to calculate the result. Optional. Possible values: any number from 1 to 25. Default value: 6. UInt8.
Tuple with two tuples with hashnum n-grams each. Tuple(Tuple(String), Tuple(String)).
